content.rendered:
For clients, being able to trust a contractor to complete their construction project to the deadline and without going over budget is an essential part of building a strong client-contractor relationship and achieving a smooth-running, stress free project.

Eden London has a reputation for completing projects on-time and on-budget. Read on to find out more about how we ensure we deliver this on every project we undertake.

Eden’s promise

For prospects looking for a contractor to manage their project, there’s a few crucial criteria that must be met. The critical promise contractors need to be able to make is to complete works to a high standard, on-time and on-budget.

At Eden London, we pride ourselves on our ability to give customers accurate quotes and forecasts for their projects, so they have peace of mind that their project will not overrun and they will not overspend from day one right through to completion.

Unlike larger construction firms, Eden London is not interested in levering more money from its clients. Our focus is on maintaining high satisfaction and retaining our clients’ custom. This is why we provide a concrete promise that we will complete projects as agreed, taking the budgetary and deadline stress out of the entire process for our clients.

How we do it

Large-scale construction and fit out projects often throw up the unexpected, which can result in delays and additional costs. This can lead many prospective clients to view the initial quote for their project as a best-case scenario.

However, when you choose Eden London, you can rest assured that your project will not exceed the figure we quote in our consultation if the project plan stays unchanged. But how do we do it?

We use an external surveyor

Many construction companies have an in-house surveyor, whose role is focussed around extracting more money from each job through additional and unnecessary suggestions.

Eden London works with independent surveyors on our projects. They provide an unbiased review of the works required, and the steps needed to complete them.

This allows us to draw up a realistic cost for the project, based on the exact work needed for each project.

We create a detailed plan

Based on the advice of the surveyor and our years of experience in the construction industry, we create a highly detailed plan for each project. 

For every project, we outline the stages of completion, the cost of each stage and the time required to do so. This allows us to create buffer points for each stage of the construction, which will cover the client in the event of unforeseen delays, additional costs or changes to the project—all things which other firms add on as extra costs.

This process provides us with a detailed blueprint of the entire project, allowing us to accurately determine the time-scale for works to be completed and the cost of this for the client. Once the project is running we, as the principal contractor, conduct strict management of subcontractors in line with our schedule to ensure everything runs like clockwork. 

Our promise in action

Our promise isn’t just words on paper, it’s visible in every project we complete. Over the past three years, Eden London has led 50 projects—and we are proud to say that every one of those has been on-time and on-budget.

Our years of experience, knowledge and project management skills mean that we can confidently take on projects in all areas of construction from £10,000 to £2million and deliver high quality results, while meeting the unique budgets, deadlines and demands of each client.

Previous projects evidence our “on-time and on-budget” promise in action. For more information, why not take a look at Eden London’s client testimonials?

Find out more

For more information about Eden London, get in touch with us today
